channel.title: Noble Spy does not work if converted that night
channel.description:
#### What happened?
I was noble D1. On N1 I chose maid spy on 6, it successfully went off, then I was converted to unseen. 6 then whispered to a bunch of people on D2 and I could not see any of their whispers.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
Aristocrat and Noble have identical abilities. Since both have the exact same maid spy I would expect the maid spy to continue working after a convert.
#### Steps to reproduce:
Maid spy N1 and get converted same night.
#### Comments:
Brilliant game keep up the good work mates.

item.title: Noble Spy does not work if converted that night
item.dc:creator: Bart_Auringer
item.description:
Might just be a side effect of changing classes. No other class has an ability that goes from Night to Day which is the transition where conversions happen.

Also not sure if it happened to the old Noble/Aristocrat when they had Maid Spy or whatever it was.
